duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and lead a diverse team of Account Executives to increase pipeline within customer base and track record leading them to add new logos
Drive accurate forecasting and strategic account planning to achieve business goals
Lead complex sales cycles and successfully attain revenue targets
Communicate, negotiate, and assist Account Executives in closing deals with key executives and stakeholders
Participate in strategic and tactical planning for the team and region
Create relationships with executives, stakeholders, and key influencers

education_certification.credential: BS or BA degree or equivalent work-related experience
